text:
resuscitation as needed.
• Examination to identify congenital disorders.
• Feed within 30 minutes, feeds 2-3 hourly.
• Monitor blood glucose: 30 minutes after 1st feed, and 2-3 hourly pre-feed thereafter; may stop monitoring once
t
hree consecutive normal blood glucose readings pre-feed, baby is feeding well and asymptomatic.
• Maintain blood glucose ≥ 2.6 mmol/L
• If blood glucose < 2.6 mmol/L manage according to hypoglycaemia protocol in the newborn guideline.
